title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote
author: LinOnetwo
name: ItonNote
description: Heavy lifting for new users to set up a powerful and opinionated knowledge management system in TidGi Desktop.
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/itonnote-plugin">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/itonnote-plugin"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/itonnote-plugin">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/itonnote-plugin"/></$button>

!! 功能

预配置了一系列琐碎的内容，一般来自各插件的Readme和论坛讨论，但大多数人懒得看Readme，故在此直接帮忙配置好了。

具体预置内容介绍可见文档网站。
